message.content:
{"id": "19089", 
"title": "No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)", 
"description": "When opening a java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear to add breakpoints/marks. However, the menu is not appearing.", 
"OB": "1) Open a java editor. 
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. 
The expected behavior is for a menu to popup which allows the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc. 
However, the menu is not appearing.", 
"EB": "The expected behavior is for a popup menu to appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc. 
However, the menu is not appearing in Photon.", 
"SR": "1) Open a java editor. 
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. 
The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc, should appear. 
However, the menu is not appearing in Photon."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '19089', 'title': 'Bug 19089No popup menu java editor ruler (Photon)', 'description': 'Bug 19089No popup menu java editor ruler (Photon) ', 'OB': '1) Open a java editor2) Right click on the left vertical rulerThis should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks,etc, butit does not. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': '1) Open a java editor2) Right click on the left vertical rulerThis should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks,etc, butit does not. '}
